com.phunware.advertising

Interface PwVideoInterstitialAd


  • public interface PwVideoInterstitialAd
    Video interstitials are full screen ads that display a video ad in their own Activity. Video interstitials are best used at discrete stopping points in your app's flow, such as at the end of a game level, or when the player dies.

    Simple example:

     VideoInterstitialAd videoInterstitialAd = PwAdvertisingModule.getVideoInterstitialAdForZone(context, "YOUR_ZONE_ID");
 videoInterstitialAd.show(); // video interstitial is loaded and shown asynchronously
    Instances of VideoInterstitialAdImpl are not safe for use by multiple threads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener
      Implement this interface to be notified of video interstitial ad lifecycle changes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener getListener() 
      boolean isLoaded()
      Used to determine if video interstitial is ready to be shown.
      void load()
      Fire off an asynchronous request to server for a video interstitial ad.
      void setListener(PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener videoInterstitialListener)

      Display video interstitial to user.

    • Method Detail

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Used to determine if video interstitial is ready to be shown.
        Returns:
        true if ready for display, false otherwise

      • load

        void load()
        Fire off an asynchronous request to server for a video interstitial ad. Use isLoaded() or PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener to determine when video interstitial is loaded.

      • show

        void show()
        Display video interstitial to user. If video interstitial is not loaded, load() will be called and the video interstitial will be loaded and shown asynchronously. Use isLoaded() or PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener to determine when video interstitial is loaded.

      • setListener

        void setListener(PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener videoInterstitialListener)
        Parameters:
        videoInterstitialListener - the listener instance that will be notified of ad lifecycle events

      • getListener

        PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener getListener()
